short_summary: Selection of an expert to support the Australian Government with the implementation of herd immunity policy
description: Request for Proposal: The Australian Government is seeking an expert to support the implementation of herd immunity policy.  The selected organisation will work with the government to develop and implement a logistics plan.  This will include establishing contact points, logistics and data sharing arrangements with other agencies and private sector, as well as ensuring security and continuity.  This contract is approximately 3 months in duration.  Selection will be based on capability and value for money.

Canadian Financial Crimes Agency (CFCA) Development and Design
--------------------------------------------------------

### Solicitation Details

*   Solicitation Number: 202302794
*   Publication Date: March 6, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: April 18, 2023, at 14:00:00 PM
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   GSIN: R019BF (Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services)
*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Limited Tendering

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

Public Safety Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the development and design of the Canadian Financial Crimes Agency (CFCA). The selected contractor will conduct research, analysis, and stakeholder interviews to develop a final report outlining options for the organizational design of the CFCA.

### Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology

*   Evaluation method: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit (70%) and Price (30%)
*   Basis of selection: Discussions
*   Selection criteria:
    *   Technical Proposal
    *   Price Proposal
    *   Past Performance
    *   References
    *   Capability to Provide Auxiliary Services

### Conditions of Contract

*   Work is to be performed from contract award to March 31, 2024
*   Contractor must demonstrate expertise in the following areas:
    *   Business Consulting
    *   Evaluation Services Consulting
    *   Subject Matter Expertise
*   Contractor must provide a comprehensive project plan, including a detailed timeline, milestones, and deliverables

### Security Requirement

*   Common #6 - Reliability Clearance

*   Senior Acquisition Advisor, Public Safety Canada
